description.raw:
There is a problem generating pssm shadows when the directional light vector is perpendicular to ogre camera's direction vector. This causes an assert failure (Issue #470) which is also reproduceable in Ogre itself.

The workaround sets gazebo's LightMaker to create a non-unit-z directional light. This also happens to remove artifacts seen on the ground plane.
